task.title: Configure to Monitor the Web Server

context.p: Once the Apache server is configured to allow to access the extended status, you can add Apache monitoring to the device within by binding the Apache template to the device.

li.p: Select Infrastructure from the navigation bar.
Click the device name in the device list.
In the left panel, expand Monitoring Templates, and then select Device.
Select Bind Templates from the Action menu.
Add the Apache template to the list of templates, and then click Save.
The Apache template is added. The system can now begin collecting the Apache server metrics from this device.
